issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
Part of the label is hidden under the Start button.

This is not a regression.This even occurs on 2.1.0.GA

Steps to Reproduce:

1. Run the Kitchen Sink application
2. Tap on Controls>Picker>Countdown Picker
3. Choose hours and minutes by scrolling up and down.

Actual Result:
The part of label is hidden under the button

Expected Result:
The label should display completely.
fields.summary: iOS: KitchenSink :Picker :Countdown Picker - Part of the label is hidden under the Start button
fields.environment:
Tested with Titanium Studio:2.1.2.201208301612
Tested with Titanium SDK: 2.1.3.v20120915120319
iOS Device: iPhone 4s(5.1)
OS: Mac OSX 10.8.1

comments.body: Resolving ticket as invalid as this version of Kitchen Sink is no longer supported.
